Submitter Information: Guangzhou Improve Medical Instruments Co., Ltd.
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for IMPROVACUTER Gel & Clot Activator Tube, a sterile evacuated blood collection device for obtaining serum from venous blood specimens for chemistry and immunology assays
Indications for Use Summary: Single use tube for collecting, transporting, separating, and processing venous blood specimens to obtain serum for clinical chemistry and immunology assays in settings where a venous blood sample is collected by a trained healthcare worker
